title: Some new gargart
content:
Hi, I got some inspiration to try to draw something this morning. I made these pictures today..
By the way, still have no that drawing table thing that could be useful when drawing. As well, I haven't practiced at all since my previous garg related picture here. Sorry! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img]
As well, didn't bother tweaking and editing the pictures more, the quality may suck but who cares.

Here's traditional garg. I was drawing it and having KeenGrid front page in mind, but probably I won't add it there. I kinda don't like how it turned out, but here's it anyways.

[img]http://keengrid.net/keenrush/gridgarg.png[/img]


Then, here's two garg-humanoid (gargnoid?) pictures. I added KeenGrid message to this picture just for fun, although there isn't much to see in KG.. But I'm working on redesign and a new site. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

[img]http://keengrid.net/keenrush/vkgt.png[/img]


And finally, I'm not sure if I should post this one, but here it goes anyways. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] Afterall, this shows no details or anything (if you see something it's your imagination). If you would be offended easily (although there is no reason to), just do NOT scroll down.. But well, I guess some older members might like it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] (Ok, doubt that..)

Post your comments!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

[img]http://keengrid.net/keenrush/keen_on_grrrg.png[/img]Eat your veggies!

title: Airbrush?
content:
Heheh. Crazy stuff. Kinda difficult to get things right at such a broad scale. Alot different to good ol' pixelart.

Instead of using the airbrush straight away, I'd suggest trying a smaller pencil-like tool that doesn't antialias [drawing it in Paint first would be easiest]. That way, you can erase and redraw all you need until you're happy with it, then go over the final linework with the airbrush. Much more accurate.

[hr]KeenRush Then, here's two garg-humanoid (gargnoid?) pictures.
[hr]The term would be Gargoid, since the 'n' in humanoid belongs to the 'human' element of the word.

Those last two are more humanoid than gargoid though, IMKO.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: haha
content:
Honestly, KeenRush, I doubt anybody would have commented on the boob-age if you hadn't made such a big deal about it. I'd have glanced over the SGA to translate it and then moved on... You shouldn't worry so much about anatomy. :-) Especially on a cartoon.

Edit: It looks nice, by the way. It'd be awesome to have some hand-drawn Gargs running around your site.

title: Re: haha
content:
Cheers. Yes, you're exactly right Xky, but I was just afraid and just wanted to make all the warning and stuff "just in case" so nobody could blame me. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Anyways, glad you like.

And thanks for the tips Spleen.

"Those last two are more humanoid than gargoid though, IMKO."
Yeah, I need to develop the gargoid concept to get it more alien. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] I'm sorry!Eat your veggies!

title: Re: haha
content:
Heh, well at least you reduced the contrast of the 'naughty' area which as we already know from another thread means the younger members of this forum can't see it [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

Oh, and yay, the first real use of my font [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: haha
content:
Fortunately this is one of those forums where gargoid porn can be posted without fear of humiliation and banishment.

I've known forums that won't let you use 'damn'A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

"Heh, well at least you reduced the contrast of the 'naughty' area which as we already know from another thread means the younger members of this forum can't see it"
Now when I think about it, it was a bit pointless to do that, since there's nothing detailed (purposefully (+ lack of imagination [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] )), only outer lines. One can see much worse in daily television advertisement.

"Fortunately this is one of those forums where gargoid porn can be posted without fear of humiliation and banishment."
Here's nothing porn related. A nude figure in art is not wrong in my opinion, although this even is NOT such a thing! (And besides, remember what you had in your fan fiction, although not written by you but that "Sarah".. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] )
Just in case you had some hint there, I'll say that for now on I'll only post gargoid drawings of gargoids that are fully clothed.

I can see these pictures (or their ideas) are disturbing for some people, I'm sorry. Or then it's that people like the idea but my drawing style sucks so they won't comment because of the bad quality. Or are just too shy to. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] I'm sorry everyone, for now on I won't post everything I draw.Eat your veggies!

title: Postpostpost! Pr0npr0npr0n!
content:
[hr]KeenRush I can see these pictures (or their ideas) are disturbing for some people, I'm sorry.
[hr]Eh? Where do you find the evidence to declare such a thing...? *shrugs* I'd rather you post all the art you can than censor yourself because of some imagined offensive interpretations.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

title: Re: Postpostpost! Pr0npr0npr0n!
content:
Actually I was, and still an, quite offended by the gratuitous use of asterisks, and I hereby humbly yet vehemently request KeenRush not to use such insulting methods of posting again.
I'm sorry to say this, but if this happens again I'll have to resort to certain measures, including telling the administrator about this terrible rudeness on a board anybody, including children, the elderly, and people missing the big toe on their left foot, can visit.
Thank you.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

I don't have any evidence, nothing said in this topic (or well, maybe LL's reply a bit, but knowing her it's probably joking or something), I just figured it out because of the fact the usual posters/spammers haven't said a word. Everyone that has said something is someone a bit older and/or more mature member of the forum who can look 'art' without freaking out. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

As for censoring, no way! I only meant I won't post everything on PCKF -- you can most probably see everything on the gargoid page if/when I make one. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
